title: Cinnamon Tempura Ice Cream is a signature item at RA Sushi
statement: RA Sushi features Cinnamon Tempura Ice Cream as a signature item, made with lightly battered cinnamon-swirl ice cream that is flash fried and finished with sauces.

citations.quote: Lightly battered cinnamon-swirl ice cream, flash fried and finished with raspberry and chocolate sauces
